  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1181</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Prepare to Escape! The Survival of Lot1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bereiten Sie vor sich zu entgehen! Das 
Überleben von Lot1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Préparez pour s'échapper ! La survie de 
Lot1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Prepare para escapar-se! A sobrevivência de
Lot1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Preparisi per fuoriuscire! La sopravvivenza 
di Lot1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Προετοιμαστείτε να δραπετεύσετε! Η επιβίωση 
Lot1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¡Prepárese para escaparse! La supervivencia
de Lot1</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">learners learn the story of Lot leaving Sdom (Bereshit 19:15-22) by playing a matching game.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bereshit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bible</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lot</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sdom</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anfänger erlernen die Geschichte des Lots Sdom 
(Bereshit 19:15-22) indem sie ein zusammenpassendes Spiel lassend 
spielen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">les étudiants apprennent l'histoire du sort 
laissant Sdom (Bereshit 19:15-22) en jouant un jeu assorti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">os learners aprendem a história do lote que deixa
Sdom (Bereshit 19:15-22) jogando um jogo combinando.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">i principianti imparano la storia del lotto che 
lascia Sdom (Bereshit 19:15-22) giocando un gioco di corrispondenza.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">οι αρχάριοι μαθαίνουν την ιστορία του μέρους 
αφήνοντας Sdom (Bereshit 19:1522) με το παιχνίδι ενός 
ταιριάζοντας με παιχνιδιού.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">los principiantes aprenden la historia de la 
porción que deja Sdom (Bereshit 19:15-22) jugando un juego que 
corresponde con.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">bereshit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bibel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lot</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
